Question: DeepBrain AI CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
DeepBrain AI

Product: AI video and avatar synthesis technology

- Showcased latest advancements in AI video and avatar synthesis technology at CES 2024
- Unveiled Dream Avatar technology for creating lifelike AI avatars using one image and voice recording
- Demoed AI Studios for text-to-video technology, enabling creation of professional-quality digital content without traditional equipment
- Conversational AI Human Experience showcased interactive and conversational AI avatar solution, AI Human, with realistic speaking mannerisms and movements
- Collaboration with Lenovo and the Scott Morgan Foundation on the 'AI Avatar Project' to empower individuals with ALS through hyper-realistic custom AI Avatar
- Received accolades for innovative technology, including AI Studios and AI Human platforms
Summary_cn:
DeepBrain AI

产品：AI视频和人物合成技术

- 在2024年的CES展会上展示了AI视频和人物合成技术的最新进展
- 推出了梦幻人物技术，利用一张图片和语音录音创建逼真的AI人物
- 展示了AI Studios的文本到视频技术，无需传统设备即可创建专业质量的数字内容
- 交互式和对话式AI人物体验展示了与真实的说话方式和动作的AI人物解决方案AI Human
- 与联想和斯科特·摩根基金会合作的“AI人物项目”旨在通过超逼真的定制AI人物使肌萎缩侧索硬化症患者更强大
- 获得了创新技术的赞誉，包括AI Studios和AI Human平台
